objects.text: 100% UV Protection • Polarized Lenses • Iconic Design
Premium Black Frame • Universal Fit • Original Case Included

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with signature design
• Premium black glossy acetate frame construction
• Dark tinted UV-protective lenses for optimal sun protection
• Iconic silver Ray-Ban logo on temple
• Comfortable and lightweight wear for all-day use
• Universal fit suitable for most face shapes
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• 100% UV protection against harmful rays
• Durable high-quality hinges for long-lasting performance
• Classic wayfarer style that never goes out of fashion

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and bold layout crafted to highlight a limited-time sunglasses deal. It has a dark-themed gradient background with subtle geometric overlays and translucent accents to add depth. The design prominently showcases the product image at the center, with layered text elements arranged above and below. The top section introduces the campaign using the “heading” and “subheading” IDs in large and contrasting fonts. Supporting details including the “tagline”, “description”, “features_1”, and “features_2” build trust and value. A vibrant “price” text draws attention, while a golden “cta_button” and matched “cta” label create a strong call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #16213e
- Deep Charcoal: #1a1a2e
- Gold Accent: #e9b949
- Warm Gold: #c9a959
- Pure White: #ffffff
- Charcoal Blue (for text button): #16213e
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses, with a sleek and modern color palette dominated by deep blacks and subtle greys. The glossy black frame (#000000) is polished and reflective, creating a bold, premium feel. The lenses are dark charcoal grey (#2E2E2E), smoothly blending into the frame while maintaining a slight contrast. Silver metallic accents (#C0C0C0) on the hinges and the printed logo bring highlights that elevate the design. These colors contrast tastefully, emphasizing luxury and minimalism. An effective advertisement banner could use black, charcoal, silver, and white (#FFFFFF) to evoke sophistication, elegance, and timeless appeal.
